textBox.richText: Idiap organized the 1st competition on speaker recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database in conjunction with The 6th IAPR/IEEE International Conference on Biometrics (http://atvs.ii.uam.es/icb2013/) June 4-7, 2013 Madrid SPAIN. The competition is now closed, results from the competition will be presented at the conference and available in the proceedings: E. Khoury, B. Vesnicer, J. Franco-Pedroso, R. Violato, Z. Boulkenafet, L.M. Mazaira Fernández, M. Diez, J. Kosmala, H. Khemiri, T. Cipr, R .Saeidi, M. Günther, L. El-Shafey, J. Žganec Gros, R. Zazo Candil, F. Sim oes, M. Bengherabi, A. Álvarez Marquina, M. Penagarikano, A. Abad, M. Boulayemen, P. Schwarz, D. Van Leeuwen, J. González-Domínguez, M. Uliani Neto, E. Boutellaa, P. Gómez Vilda, A. Varona, S. Guedria, P. Matějka, J. González-Rodríguez, T. Pereira, F. Harizi, L. J. Rodriguez-Fuentes, D. Petrovska-Delacrétaz, M. Angeloni, G. Bordel, G. Chollet, and S. Marcel. The 2013 speaker verification evaluation in mobile environment using the MOBIO database. In IAPR International Conference on Biometrics (ICB), 2013. (to appear). More information at: http://www.beat-eu.org/evaluations/icb-2013-speaker-recognition-mobio
1st competition on speaker recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database
